## createTextDecoderCombiner() function

Creates a chunk combiner instance that uses UTF-8 TextDecoder to decode Uint8Arrays into strings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function createTextDecoderCombiner(): ChunkCombiner;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

ChunkCombiner
